title: LoL loading screen concept idea! (not my work)

embed.description: I made this loading screen to pass time since I don't have anything to do. I mean, I do but I don't want to. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Viva la...

body:
I was scrolling through the new reddit part on league and found this guy who made a new LoL loading screen and he added in a something I think we have all thought of that is a chat in loading screen to chat to the other team and your team. The main thing about this loading screen is that it is suttle on the eye and nothing pops out at you too much. ps: btw this isnt my work for anybody whos about to go ape shit in the comments

:http://i.imgur.com/FGLyMdt.png

replies.body:
rito pls.

Hire the man who made this.
yea i love the art but i like how most the edges are so  soft

Please make this I begging you, nice scenery to look at while we load, talk to our team while you wait so we're not bored out of your mind while you wait for jinx on 2% to load... best thing since Zz'Rot Portal
That looks great! it means that during the loading, you can discuss a game plan! Fantastic!
yea thats what I was thinking to like if you wanted to you could plan out a buff invade and stuff or describe plans

This is such a great idea! You could discuss about things about the game before it starts cause if no one has Skype or anything like that, they could just talk early and normally instead of trying wait for everyone to go 100%. Good idea!
